Negative_Review: Have already commented in my overall review in 3 above
Positive_Review: Hotel s location is excellent They gave me a Boulevard facing room which I had requested earlier at the time of booking I had originally thought that a 16 sq meter room would be small and not comfortable I was a little surprised that it is not so Although you it is a little cramped with the furniture but overall consider all aspects it was comfortable Their staff are was very polite and helpful Wish they increase their numbers considering it is FOUR Srar property whose major front office functions including concierge functions can not be left to single purpose at the reception

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was smallish but I expect that in Europe the air conditioner worked well in the beginning but by the end of the week it wasn t keeping the room cool enough

Negative_Review: Would have liked their to be a mini bar fridge Shower water was very slow to go down drain pipe
Positive_Review: We were very happy with the service staff and location

Negative_Review: Some of the staff was confused first he was not able to read our names second he gave us a wrong room upgrade which he changed just after we started unpacking The worse thing was we got the second room at 3 10 PM one hour after the regular check in time Then we were asked to pay the city tax even if it was paid through your site However at check out they reimbursed us the amount of tax we paid extra Too many mistakes for a few days stay
Positive_Review: The hotel is small but the rooms and the bathrooms are fine The location is not bad being in walking distance from Eiffel Tour and not far from Champs Elizee The restaurants near by are not expensive without being convenient either except the Asian one with really low prices

Negative_Review: Room size was snug but considering we were not spending much time in the room not a problem
Positive_Review: Beds were really nice and the breakfast was in a cozy cellar with really nice croissants Excellent location

Negative_Review: Staff was not very English speaking and when asked about directions gave simple answers a d didn t give alternative ways to get around
Positive_Review: Bath room was clean and nice The beds were Not as comfortable mattresses could be better But room was large And felt good

Negative_Review: Feel the hotel could do with just a little modernisation to bring it up to where other similar hotels are at
Positive_Review: Everyone was friendly and the hotel was very central

Negative_Review: There was construction and the elevator was not working The bathroom lights flickered They did not make up my room or give me fresh tea or coffee for it until I called down 2ce
Positive_Review: They gave me a coupon for a drink of bunbly at a mearby restaurant I guess for inconvenience but they should have reduced room fees

Negative_Review: The shower in room 42 is not the best The shower head needs cleaning or repair
Positive_Review: First the staff is extremely good The location is awesome and the beds are comfortable

Negative_Review: Smaller room than the photos on the web indicated Some clever photography techniques used Our room was on the 6th floor undergoing roof repairs my view was of tarpaulin and scaffolding I had asked at booking for a nice view as the trip was for my wife s birthday My request appears not to have been considered The room as very compact but the facilities listed were all found to be in place The television although having english speaking channels listed were not available The terrace was not available for use undergoing repairs On the 6th floor the lift could clearly be heard rumbling up and down
Positive_Review: Good location and excellent WiFi Good breakfast selection

Negative_Review: I actually had taken a train to Paris for my two day stay and had left some toiletry items in Nice thinking that I wouldn t need them But my hotel in Paris didn t have these items in the bathroom It wasn t a major issue though
Positive_Review: The helpful friendliness of the staff and close local to the things I wanted to see

Negative_Review: The lady in the breakfast room was not willing to make a swap in the so called express breakfast yoghurt instead of a croisant and a roll moreover the express breakfast was in the lobby and coffee was kept in a large can Checked out without any food The BW I stayed in in May had no problem with my request
Positive_Review: Checked in by Giovanni Politeand nice

Negative_Review: Very noisy hotel Occupants in next room sounded like they were in ours Not good if you re a light sleeper
Positive_Review: Staff friendly and helpful Room clean and tidy Situated within walking distance from everywhere if you re ok with walking

Negative_Review: Friend couldn t order room service at 01 00in the morning when it was supposed be 24 hours But was offered a few packets of crisp
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy n clean Reception staff very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Small rooms Parisian Elevator good for two Ground floor was under renovation but hey breakfast room is the smallest and mysterious I have ever seen
Positive_Review: Location was great for our purpose but also in Paris Staff is very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Everything was almost perfect Only wish small fridge mini bar in room
Positive_Review: A soft comfortable bed the very helpful staff and grate location Can evaluate variety of breakfast because we did t use this service as we had a kettle in the room

Negative_Review: The shower was a little cramped due to the low slanted ceiling on 6th floor I was cold that evening and they said there was no heating in the summer I was proposed to take a hot shower instead
Positive_Review: The room was nice and the bed comfortable

Negative_Review: No restaurant in the hotel Places to eat are far away
Positive_Review: The people at the reception were espectacular They were a lot if help for m ltiple things we need

Negative_Review: limited tea coffee curtains didn t match stain on floor dust hairs round bathroom floor
Positive_Review: location great room adequate hair dryer in bathroom

Negative_Review: Carpet a bit worn but room was really clean so it didn t matter too much
Positive_Review: Very clean Great location Plenty of restaurants nearby Staff very courteous and helpful

Negative_Review: The same price was charged for adult breakfast and child s breakfast There should be a deduction in price for under 10 s as they do not eat as much
Positive_Review: Fantastic location clean tidy and great staff

Negative_Review: Heating in the room was far too hot and wouldn t turn down so we had to open the window One of the blinds in the bathroom was missing Neither would have been much of a problem except renovation work was underway and we had scaffolding outside our room This meant with the window open we were disturbed by noise from the workmen in the morning and my girlfriend had to shower at select times when the workmen couldn t see into the bathroom
Positive_Review: Reasonably priced for Paris good location large bed helpful staff

Negative_Review: The room was too warm and we had no refrigerator and no bottles of water apart the day of our arrival The red walls and moquette give a sense of anxiety and darkness
Positive_Review: The position is good just a few minutes away from the Eiffel Tower and the metro station of Les Invalides Our room 21 had a balcony and despite the traffic was very quiet WiFi always worked properly The staff last but not least was very very polite I really appreciated it

Negative_Review: I booked 3 rooms for 4 nights first night have a bottle of complimentary water only second night no towels in the bath room no refill of suger and milks in the rooms 3rd night no refill of shower shampoo empty bottles in the bathroom very disappointed lift is very small but better than nothing 4th floor rooms are painted in dark red colour small and old very different from the photos shows in booking com website good location but it should not be a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: Nothing I will return soon
Positive_Review: Staff staff staff everyone was super friendly and helpful breakfast was also very good with a lot of variety Room was very clean the standard room was small so we decided to upgrade to a superior room which was very spacious bright and clean Location is excellent within walking distance to Eiffel Tower champs elysse invalides

Negative_Review: Tiny bit dusty behind bathroom doors tiles need a little clean Rooms could do with a mini fridge and more English TV channels
Positive_Review: Must stress how lovely all the staff are and location is amazing Our room this year was a superior which was lovely with A C if needed Generally very clean and very comfortable This hotel is in perfect location and this is the second time we stayed Happily stay here again

Negative_Review: Breakfast poor standard and bits bought out at a time eg only 3 rashers of bacon 2 slices of bread 2 crossiants you had to ask for food to be replenished If we had known this we would not have paid for breakfast but walked to the bistro at end of the road and ordered breakfast there for 10 We were nt advised of the building works going on in the courtyard and we were staying in room 5 that is in the courtyard the workman stared at 8 and outside of the front door was constantly wet
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Staff welcoming

Negative_Review: Our air conditioning didn t work and there were renovations going on in the garden area outside our room This meant we had to walk underneath scaffolding to and from our room There were workmen using loud tools there also from 9 am until 5pm each day We were not aware of this when we booked
Positive_Review: Very clean and tidy Our room was quite spacious for 4 people and on ground level which we were thankful for with our luggage

Negative_Review: We had accommodation for 5 nights On two occasions when we returned at 3PM the rooms had not been serviced On another occasion same situation but this time it was after 4PM When complained to manager he simply stated they did not have sufficient cleaning staff A traveler we met at the hotel said he waited until 7PM for his room to be serviced
Positive_Review: The location

Negative_Review: Very small for three adults very pricey but there again its the location The extra bed mattress was not balanced on one side it should be rotated regularly to avoid wearing on one side
